OM_Laezel_COM.synopsis: Lae'zel confronts a tiefling that has seen another githyanki. She tried to prise the information from him with intimidation, perhaps insisting he bow to show proper deference. Key emotions: Lae'zel is arrogant and fearsome; Zorru is afraid she will attack, but tries not to show it - at first.
OM_Laezel_COM.how_to_trigger: - Have Lae'zel in your party- Talk to Zorru in the grove (goto 201, 567)

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Note: T|his dialogue has a lot of copies of certain branches for cinematics purposes. Do not try to condense without speaking to writer or cinematics! Lae'zel confronts a tiefling that has seen another githyanki. She tries to prise the information from him with intimidation, perhaps insisting he bow to show proper deference. Key emotions: Lae'zel is arrogant and fearsome; Zorru is afraid she will attack, but tries not to show it - at first.
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: - Have Laezel in your party- Go to the Grove- Separate Laezel from the party and use her to talk to Zorru. (Make sure the other party members are far enough away so the dialog only happens between Laezel and Zorru!)

OM_Laezel_COM_25.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_25.text: My f-friend's blood not enough? Come to rip me open, too?
OM_Laezel_COM_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling raises his weapon half-heartedly.

OM_Laezel_COM_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel approaches the sniveling tiefling. Camera should see her from slightly below so she seems to lord over him.

OM_Laezel_COM_22.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_22.text: In Crèche K'liir, a formal greeting begins with a bow.

OM_Laezel_COM_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling looks to the player.

OM_Laezel_COM_11.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_11.text: Yes. And I suggest you do as she says.

OM_Laezel_COM_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling pauses, then bows slightly.

OM_Laezel_COM_110.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_110.text: Wait for the tiefling to obey.

OM_Laezel_COM_100.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_100.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass.

OM_Laezel_COM_88.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_88.text: Saw us 'fore we s-saw it. Jammed its b-b-blade through Yul's belly, straight to the other side.

OM_Laezel_COM_77.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_77.text: No twisting? Kin must have been in a hurry.

OM_Laezel_COM_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location.InternalNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location. Map marker should nnow appear.

OM_Laezel_COM_33.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_33.text: Up. You can keep your innards.

OM_Laezel_COM_20.speaker: Wyll
OM_Laezel_COM_20.text: By the dead gods, are all gith so brutal?

OM_Laezel_COM_52.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_52.text: Brutal? Blood still flows through his own veins. I was positively gentle.

OM_Laezel_COM_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling rises but is still fearful.

OM_Laezel_COM_56.speaker: Astarion
OM_Laezel_COM_56.text: You're not going to eviscerate him? I was hoping for a show.

OM_Laezel_COM_83.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_83.text: Cool your blood - I'll indulge you soon enough.

OM_Laezel_COM_112.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_112.text: She's serious. You'd better get on your knees. Fast.

OM_Laezel_COM_114.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_114.text: That's enough, Lae'zel. I'll take it from here.

OM_Laezel_COM_74.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_74.text: You dare interrupt? Has the tadpole ravaged your senses?

OM_Laezel_COM_73.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_73.text: Has the tadpole ravaged your senses? It is his suffering that will lead us to purity.

OM_Laezel_COM_89.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_89.text: Fine - do as you must. But keep it quick.

OM_Laezel_COM_47.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_47.text: Enough, Lae'zel. You will be silent.

OM_Laezel_COM_95.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel scowls, then steps out of the way to let you interorgate the tiefling yourself.

OM_Laezel_COM_18.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player helps tiefling to his feet.

OM_Laezel_COM_54.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_54.text: What do you want from m-me?

OM_Laezel_COM_103.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_103.text: Information. Where did you see the githyanki?

OM_Laezel_COM_90.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_90.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass.

OM_Laezel_COM_32.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_32.text: Saw us 'fore we s-saw it. Jammed its b-b-blade through Yul's belly, straight to the other side.

OM_Laezel_COM_27.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_27.text: And I just... I just ran.

OM_Laezel_COM_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is mad at you.

OM_Laezel_COM_39.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_39.text: You can breathe again. I won't let her hurt you.

OM_Laezel_COM_75.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_75.text: Tell me of this gith, or I will serrate your ears until I see one in you.

OM_Laezel_COM_21.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_21.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass.

OM_Laezel_COM_30.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_30.text: Saw us 'fore we s-saw it. Jammed its b-b-blade through Yul's belly, straight to the other side.

OM_Laezel_COM_81.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_81.text: And I just... I just ran.

OM_Laezel_COM_79.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location.InternalNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location. Map marker should nnow appear.

OM_Laezel_COM_91.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_91.text: I'm sorry. She can be... harsh.

OM_Laezel_COM_97.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_97.text: Thanks for the information. You can get up.
OM_Laezel_COM_97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling stands up and nods to you.

OM_Laezel_COM_101.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling should now remain where he is in a kneeling position.

OM_Laezel_COM_66.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_66.text: Quit snivelling. We're done with you.

OM_Laezel_COM_6.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_6.text: Just keep that th-thing away from me.

OM_Laezel_COM_23.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_23.text: All right, Lae'zel. You got what you needed.

OM_Laezel_COM_13.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_13.text: Yes. Your mediocre interrogation technique notwithstanding.

OM_Laezel_COM_14.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_14.text: Yes. Your mediocre interrogation technique notwithstanding.

OM_Laezel_COM_4.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_4.text: Up. You can keep your innards.

OM_Laezel_COM_104.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_104.text: You - tell me where you saw the githyanki.

OM_Laezel_COM_78.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_78.text: Hold it, Lae'zel. I'll see to this one.

OM_Laezel_COM_62.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_62.text: You dare interrupt? Has the tadpole ravaged your senses?

OM_Laezel_COM_93.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_93.text: Fine - do as you must. But make it quick.

OM_Laezel_COM_82.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_82.text: Enough. Stand down - I won't tell you again.

OM_Laezel_COM_3.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel scowls, then steps out of the way to let you interorgate the tiefling yourself.NodeContext: Idiot! (keh-CHOCK-ey)

OM_Laezel_COM_35.text: You can breathe again. I won't let her hurt you.

OM_Laezel_COM_105.text: Tell me of this gith, or I will serrate your ears until I see one in you.

OM_Laezel_COM_72.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_72.text: You - tell me where you saw the githyanki.

OM_Laezel_COM_102.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_102.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass.

OM_Laezel_COM_106.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_106.text: Saw us 'fore we s-saw it. Jammed its b-b-blade through Yul's belly, straight to the other side.

OM_Laezel_COM_38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location.InternalNodeContext: Lae'zel shows the tiefling the map, and he marks the location. Map marker should nnow appear.

OM_Laezel_COM_94.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_94.text: Thanks for your help... and apologies for my companion.

OM_Laezel_COM_71.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_71.text: Quit your snivelling. We're done with you.

OM_Laezel_COM_53.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_COM_53.text: Just keep that th-thing away from me.

OM_Laezel_COM_76.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_76.text: All right, Lae'zel. You got what you needed.

OM_Laezel_COM_17.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_17.text: Yes. Your mediocre interrogation technique notwithstanding.

OM_Laezel_COM_10.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_10.text: Talk, tiefling. Where did you see another like her?

OM_Laezel_COM_41.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_41.text: I think we can resolve this with some decorum - don't you think?

OM_Laezel_COM_85.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_85.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel turns to you for her line, then turns back to the tiefling.NodeContext: Matter of fact.

OM_Laezel_COM_48.speaker: Player
OM_Laezel_COM_48.text: Show some sympathy, Lae'zel. He's terrified.

OM_Laezel_COM_24.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_COM_24.text: Has the tadpole ravaged your senses? Sympathy will not lead us to purity.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Narrator
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_14.text: *You recall the child from before. This man is Zorru; he has seen other githyanki.*

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_60.text: My f-friend's blood not enough? Come to rip me open, too?
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling raises his weapon half-heartedly.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_75.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_75.text: On Crèche K'liir, a proper greeting begins with a bow.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The tiefling pauses, then bows slightly.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_1.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass. I'll sh-show you.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling marks player's map with exact location.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_6.text: What were you doing out at the pass?

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_93.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_93.text: We were s-scouting the road to Baldur's Gate.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_56.text: It saw us 'fore we saw it. Jammed its blade through Yul's belly, straight to the other side.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_44.text: And I just... I just ran.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_86.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_86.text: Stand up. I got what I came for.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling looks at Lae'zel fearfully and then stands.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_53.context: CinematicNodeContext: He looks up Lae'zel in fear, but stays slightly bowed.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_105.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_105.text: Very good. You can stand now.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling looks at Lae'zel fearfully and then stands.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Zorru

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_45.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass. That way.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tiefling points vaguely west. Map marker should mark a vague area.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_22.text: Indeed I have. Any last words?

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_74.context: CinematicNodeContext: He holds his weapon aloft for a moment more, then falls to his knees.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_31.text: P-please. Have mercy, I beg you.

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_73.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_73.text: You saw someone who looks like me. Where?

OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Zorru
OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_64.text: On the road to Baldur's Gate, near the mountain p-pass. I'll sh-show you.
